ws.rocket.config

Class ConfigModel.ConfigModelBuilder<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • ws.rocket.config.ConfigModel.ConfigModelBuilder<T>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - The type of the configuration bean.
    Enclosing class:
    ConfigModel<T>

    public static final class ConfigModel.ConfigModelBuilder<T>
extends Object
    Configuration model builder defines the language for describing a configuration file sections and their content parsing methods.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static interface  ConfigModel.ConfigModelBuilder.BeanWriter<T>
      Section writer factory contract to use when the section reader passes on a Map collection.
      static interface  ConfigModel.ConfigModelBuilder.ReaderFactory<T>
      Factory for defining common section readers.
      static interface  ConfigModel.ConfigModelBuilder.ValueWriter<T>
      Section writer factory contract to use when the section reader supports at least writing the gathered section data to a configuration bean property.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      ConfigModel.ConfigModelBuilder(Class<T> type, ValueConverter valueConverter)
      Creates a new instance of model builder for given configuration bean type.

    • Constructor Detail

      • ConfigModel.ConfigModelBuilder

        public ConfigModel.ConfigModelBuilder(Class<T> type,
                              ValueConverter valueConverter)
        Creates a new instance of model builder for given configuration bean type.
        Parameters:
        type - The class of the configuration bean (for creating an instance of it during parsing).
        valueConverter - The value converter to use to convert String values to runtime types.

    • Method Detail

      • section

        public ConfigModel.ConfigModelBuilder<T> section(String name,
                                        SectionReader reader,
                                        SectionWriter writer)
        Adds a section definition with all the necessary handlers. This is recommended to use when custom section reader and writer is used. Otherwise, the #section(String) method is recommended, as it is more readable and safer.

        A ModelException will be raised when there is a data conflict between the reader or writer, or the writer cannot write to destination bean

        Parameters:
        name - Section name. Must not be empty and already used.
        reader - Section reader instance.
        writer - Section writer instance.
        Returns:
        This model builder.

      • section

        public ConfigModel.ConfigModelBuilder.ReaderFactory<T> section(String sectionName)
        Starts a new section description block with given section name.
        Parameters:
        sectionName - Section name. Must not be empty and already used.
        Returns:
        A factory instance for choosing a reader for this section.

      • ready

        public ConfigModel<T> ready()
        Finalizes configuration model using the previously added sections.
        Returns:
        A new configuration model instance with defined sections.
